segments.text: Just a minute , please.It ' s in my bag.Here it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you.Please fill out the Baggage Declaration Form .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right.Shall I enter all my belongings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , only the articles listed on the Declaration .
segments.speaker: S1
